title: Bioinformatics Pipelines
content: Tired of dealing with messy code and complex workflows? I can help build easy-to-use, scalable, reproducible pipelines so that you can turn your raw sequencing data into results, fast.

title: Cloud Infrastructure
content: I am an expert with AWS cloud services, and can setup, maintain and troubleshoot your AWS cloud infrastructure for bioinformatics, using the most efficient, cost-saving resources.

title: Data Analysis and Visualization
content: Need help with finding significant mutations in your tumor samples, or discovering differentially expressed genes between your sample cohorts? I can help with sequencing QC, genome alignment, differential expression, single cell analysis, variant calling, data visualization and much more.

title: Software Development
content: I can help with almost all of your software needs, including website design, frontend development, SQL and NoSQL databases, REST APIs, and code management. I am well-versed in Python and Javascript and have built the entire tech stack for several biotech companies.
